            Bio
            Alvaro Pereira Filho studies political behaviour and
            comparative politics at Western
            University. His research focuses on . He frequently
            collaborates . His work has been featured in Opiniao Publica
            and Innovation in Aging.
            
            
            Education
            University of Western Ontario | Ontario,
            Canada
            Ph.D. in Political Science | September 2019 - Present
            University of Brasilia | Distrito
            Federal, Brazil
            M.A. in Political Science | March 2015 - June 2017
            B.S. in Political Science | August 2008 - June 2012
            
            
            Experience
